name: adamantly
content:

in a way that means it is impossible to persuade you or make you change your opinion or decision: The mayor is adamantly opposed to any tax increase. Most people were adamantly against the decision. See
adamant
More examplesFewer examplesHe adamantly defends his strategy.She adamantly denies that she had anything to do with the incident.She is adamantly opposed to the destruction of the trees.
